com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model

Class HelperConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kentcdodds.javahelper.model.HelperConnection

  • public class HelperConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper object for the SQLHelper. Has several helpful methods of its own.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HelperConnection()
      Empty constructor, be sure to set jdbcURL and properties map
      HelperConnection(java.lang.String jdbcURL, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
      Full constructor
      HelperConnection(java.lang.String jdbcURL, java.util.Properties properties)
      Full constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addQueryToQueue(HelperQuery helperQuery)
      Adds the helperQuery to the queue
      int[] executeBatchQuery(HelperQuery helperQuery)
      Creates a PreparedStatement from the given helperQuery's query and fills it with batches of the HelperQuery's QueryParameters then executes the PreparedStatement in batch and returns the returned int[]
      int[] executeBatchStatement(java.sql.PreparedStatement pstmt)
      Executes the given statement in batch and returns the int[]
      java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(HelperQuery helperQuery)
      Executes the given HelperQuery on this connection based on the HelperQuery's query and the first of the QueryParameters in the HelperQuery's list
      java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(HelperQuery helperQuery, int pos)
      Executes the given HelperQuery on this connection based on the HelperQuery's query and the pos (1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.) QueryParameters of the HelperQuery's QueryParameter list
      java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(HelperQuery helperQuery, QueryParameter... parameters)
      Executes the given HelperQuery on this connection based on the HelperQuery's query and the given QueryParameters
      java.util.List<HelperQuery> executeQueue()
      Executes the queries in the queue in sequence and returns the successfully executed queries (the errored queries can be found in the error list).
      java.sql.ResultSet executeStatement(java.sql.PreparedStatement pstmt)
      Executes the given statement and returns the result set
      void fillStatement(java.sql.PreparedStatement pstmt, QueryParameter... params)
      Applies the parameters to the statement

      • executeQueue

        public java.util.List<HelperQuery> executeQueue()
        Executes the queries in the queue in sequence and returns the successfully executed queries (the errored queries can be found in the error list). Catches its own errors.
        Returns:
